text: Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion

"The weather forecast:
cloudy with a chance of sunshine"

"Today during gym class dodgeball,
I was the last one standing!"

"There were moments when I managed to
catch a ball that was about to hit my friends."

"When they said "thank you!"
I wondered if this is how heroes always feel"

Oh wow!
Kaho, you did amazing! You were a star out there!
Ehehe...!

"And then, I remembered about the
sealed treasure we have at home...!"
A treasure?

Yes!
It's a sparkling and cool-looking sword!
...But I don't remember where I put it...

Producer-san,
I'd be happy if you could pray for it to be found...!

Sure, got it...!
Let's hope it's found...!
Let's hope it's found...!

But a sword sounds like something a hero
would have, right? The protagonist of a story.

Yes! ...Oh, but,
Producer-san and I are already the protagonists!

That's right.
We promised to charge forward in our idol story together.

When the two of us are together,
we're unbeatable! So...
Tomorrow, surely, there'll be even more fun things!
